guide.introduction:
I built this over a couple of weeks, most of the time spent trying to find the right parts to do what I wanted.

This rocket launcher uses a 2x4 frame as a platform, large diameter steel pipe as the reservoir, a large ball valve for the release, a nautical quick release to trigger, a large sprint to pull the ball valve open, and a length of 1/2 copper pipe as the launch tube.

guide.summary: I don't like pressurized PVC.  It makes me nervous.  I decided to design this entirely out of metal pipe and metal components as I intended to use this with my small children.
